name: Gunpey online
description:
Online adaption of the old puzzle game Gunpey. You must connect the left and right sides by connecting the segments. But you can only move a segment vertically. Not as easy as it looks!

Speed mode : Hurry up make segments disappear before they reach the top, and do the highest score.

Puzzle mode : Try to solve hard puzzle in one shot.

Editor : Create and share your own brain teaser!

And a new puzzle every week!
